name: Sore Core (GGJ2020)
description:
Sore Core is a game about fixing the broken reactor by using your head. Made for Global Game Jam 2020

Team:
  • Nani (Game Design, Art)
  • Antti Koponen (Technical Design, Programming, Animation, Sound Design)
  • Teija Pelkonen (UI art)
  • Janina Sulin (Brainstorming)
Tools:
  • Unity
  • Krita
  • Audacity
